title: Technology-Enhanced STEM Teacher Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM education concepts and experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professional teachers to strengthen competency in designing technology-based STEM lessons in online environments

learning_goals: Participants can apply the five core principles of STEM-integrated lesson design (competency-based, interdisciplinary approach, student-centered, authentic tasks, collaborative learning) to utilize online lesson design tools
Participants can evaluate and improve lesson design prototypes by utilizing learning analytics features
Participants can complete STEM lesson plans by applying a three-stage iterative design process using visual learning design tools

resources: Visual learning design tool subscription license

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
